attributes.action: Re-instate Real Nappy Initiative in Newham
attributes.additional_details:
To re-instate Real Nappy Initiative in Newham.

Newham to promote Initative & different types of nappies via NHS antenatal classes,Sure start centres, Hospitals including Midwife centres.

Each mother/family should get voucher posted offering or some sort of mandatory sign posting of nappies.

Encourage Nappychino meets with possible funding

Considering Newham has over 6000 births a year in the UK, it is dissappointing to find out there is no scheme for cloth nappies.
There is not enough sign posting of whats available.
Surely this initiative will help waste & enironment?
